dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A major weather shift is coming to Astana and Almaty over the next few days.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A major weather shift is coming to Astana and Almaty over the next few days.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Following a period of abnormal heat, variable cloudiness, rain, thunderstorms, and even hail are forecast in Astana and Almaty in the coming days.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh wow, yeah, I was just looking at that. Astana's gonna get hit with thunderstorms and even a dust storm on the 17th.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh wow, yeah, I was just looking at that. Astana's gonna get hit with thunderstorms and even a dust storm on the seventeenth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On May 17, the capital will see partly cloudy skies with rain and thunderstorms expected in the afternoon. A dust storm is also forecast.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and those northeastern winds are no joke—gusts up to 20 meters per second.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and those northeastern winds are no joke-gusts up to twenty meters per second.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Northeastern winds will blow at 9"14 m/s with gusts reaching 15"20 m/s during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And then temperatures just plummet after that. Like, uh, by May 19th, we're talking nighttime lows of only +7 to +9 in Astana.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then temperatures just plummet after that. Like, uh, by May nineteenth, we're talking nighttime lows of only +seven to +nine in Astana.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Temperatures will fall further, with nighttime lows of +7¦+9ÂC and daytime highs of +17¦+19ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's a huge drop from the low 30s. Meanwhile, Almaty starts off super hot, like 35 to 37 degrees.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a huge drop from the low 30s. Meanwhile, Almaty starts off super hot, like thirty five to thirty seven degrees.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Temperatures will stay high, with nighttime lows of +20¦+22ÂC and daytime highs of +35¦+37ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and their emergency department is actually warning people to avoid going outside to prevent heatstroke.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and their emergency department is actually warning people to avoid going outside to prevent heatstroke.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Due to the extreme heat, Almaty's Emergency Department advises residents to avoid outdoor activity to prevent heatstroke.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But then it totally flips for them too—by the 18th, they're expecting heavy rain, hail, squalls...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But then it totally flips for them too-by the eighteenth, they're expecting heavy rain, hail, squalls...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Rain, including heavy showers, thunderstorms, hail, and squalls are expected during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Even gusts up to 23 meters per second during storms. That's intense.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Even gusts up to twenty three meters per second during storms. That's intense.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Winds will shift to the west and northwest at 3"8 m/s, with gusts of up to 18"23 m/s during storms.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's like both cities are getting these extreme swings, just in opposite directions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's like both cities are getting these extreme swings, just in opposite directions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. You've got Astana going from hot and dusty to cold and rainy, and Almaty from scorching to stormy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. You've got Astana going from hot and dusty to cold and rainy, and Almaty from scorching to stormy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The advice is pretty clear though—keep windows closed, don't light fires in the mountains...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The advice is pretty clear though-keep windows closed, don't light fires in the mountains...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Keep windows and balconies closed during dust storms and thunderstorms. Do not light fires in the mountains, overload power lines, or leave children in parked vehicles.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And maybe just, like, don't plan any picnics this weekend.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And maybe just, like, don't plan any picnics this weekend.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Seriously. Umbrella and layers are the move.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seriously. Umbrella and layers are the move.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The weather will deteriorate sharply"don't forget your umbrella. The cold spell will continue"dress accordingly.
